description: Try our easy to follow Witches Hat Nori Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Witches Hat Nori Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Lebanese cucumber, thinly sliced into 6cm batons
2 spring onions, halved lengthways, cut into 6cm lengths

recipeInstructions.text: Place rice into a small saucepan with 1 cup water. Cover and bring to the boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat to low and cook, covered, for 25-30 minutes or until water is absorbed. Remove from heat and leave covered for 10 minutes to steam.
Meanwhile, combine vinegar, sugar and 1/2 tsp salt in a small bowl, stirring to dissolve sugar. Set aside. Combine soy and mayonnaise in a separate bowl and set aside.
Transfer rice to a large roasting pan. Sprinkle vinegar mixture over and stir through rice for 5 minutes or until rice has cooled.

Cut 6 x 5cm rounds from 4 nori sheets and set aside. Lay one nori sheet, shiny-side down, on a board. Place 1 heaped tablespoon rice across the middle of nori sheet. Top with a little cucumber, spring onion, carrot and avocado. Roll up to form a cone and fold over the open end, wetting edge with a little water to seal. Repeat to make 6 nori rolls.
To make hat brims, spread nori rounds with a little mayonnaise mixture and top each with a rice cracker. Moisten edge of cone and press round on to form brim. Repeat to make 6 hats.
